website_summaries.verdict: Uses a composite fiberglass and graphite construction that makes this casting rod extremely durable.
pros: Good casting rod for many different types of fishing techniques and species of fish
Rod has a lightweight feel that is well-balanced and comfortable to use
Includes an EVA foam grip that helps you avoid hand fatigue when you're battling a large fish
Good sensitivity that allows you to feel even slight nibbles on the line
cons: Tip of the rod may be too brittle or flimsy to meet the needs of some anglers

customer_reviews.title: The 2 piece Rod
customer_reviews.text: This 2 piece rod has the sensitivity of a medium with the strength of a heavy. It also stays together better then my Uglystick baitcaster rod.
customer_reviews.author: Ray

customer_reviews.title: Good price
customer_reviews.text: Took it out yesterday caught two on five lb ,the other almost four and half and this one this evening.
customer_reviews.author: Jerome Thomas

customer_reviews.title: This rod casts a mile with a TON of backbone to land your big catch
customer_reviews.text: As a guide in Central Florida I depend upon a rod with a quick tip for long casts, but mostly one that has a solid backbone to land big fish. I’ve got rods in my garage that cost upwards of $450 and this stick stands up right next to them.
customer_reviews.author: Capt Scott Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Great rod!
customer_reviews.text: Works well and I paired it with the manufacturers bait cast reel. Very nice feel and casts well too! Strong yet has flex for fighting fish. Landed a nice Northern Pike on Topwater outta the salad and it had plenty of power to horse him outta that junk! Very happy with this rod!
customer_reviews.author: Leaf Fan

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I ended up getting the 2 piece med heavy paired with the torrent reel. For ease of traveling. This combo with 25lb braid is great and can handle both my saltwater and fresh water needs
customer_reviews.author: WILL

customer_reviews.title: Fish em up
customer_reviews.text: I like the rod very sensitive can't wait for the weather to eat up so I can get out there
customer_reviews.author: Jack Rau

customer_reviews.title: Great rod series!!!
customer_reviews.text: Hands down one of the best rods I have used!!! I have the 7'1" medium heavy jig rod. At this size it is a very versatile rod that can cover lots of fishing techniques. I use it for my more heavier lures as in football jigs and Texas rigs. The rod itself is designed perfect, the handle fits great in your hand. The line guides are strong and perfect for using leaders. I caught a largemouth bass on my first trip and this rod handled it with ease. This is an amazing price for a high-end rod series. I will be purchasing more in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Richie Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Sweet rods for a great price!
customer_reviews.text: Really loving the performance of these rods, not to mention the price point is awesome.. You can tell the components on these rods is quality stuff. The guides are solid, the reel seat is nice in your hands, and the weight of the rod and sensitivity is on point. I've had a few friends use them and were surprised when I said they were 60$. Definitely a good buy for an angler on a budget!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Be ready to be surprised
customer_reviews.text: This pole has become one of my favorites!!!! The sensitivity is out of this world for the price I paid for it. To be honest I was planning on not being satisfied at all with this pole and had doubts from my buddy that it was going to be either extremely stiff or very cheaply made. It has the perfect amount of action that you would expect from a medium heavy rod and it is extremely well made. I plan on in the very near future on purchasing more piscifun rods and reels!!!!! This brand will be taking over my arsenal of fishing gear!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking and feeling rod.
customer_reviews.text: I haven't fished with it yet so rating may change in the future but I really like the look and feel of this rod. Very light with a strong backbone. Much better than I expected for $44 sale item. The packaging was great, in a thick tube with foam protection, this is the way all fishing poles should be packaged.
customer_reviews.author: Erik

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Rod
customer_reviews.text: I loved the way it fit my hands. It’s balanced great. The foam grip is comfortable for fishing all day even in the rain. With the titanium oxide eyeshwi last forever. It’s amazing how much you can feel with the rod. I was feeling gravel I have never felt before. This rod was built to last and can’t wait to use it more. It’s becoming my favorite rod I have. I will for sure be buying more!!!
customer_reviews.author: Hunter H

customer_reviews.title: The Rods and reels are a quality for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Ok, this is my second rod from Piscifun.The first is the medium 7'. It is pretty nice,newer style rod for a great price. I wants to get the larger rod for throwing larger lures and swim baits. Can't beat the quality for the price. I also purchased 2 of the Torrent reels. I will add a spinning rod and these will be the 2019 setup. I think they will last longer.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Jones

customer_reviews.title: Good bait casting rod for the price
customer_reviews.text: This bait casting rod is a nice size and weight. The price is great and the packaging for shipping was good (I was worried about shipping of a fishing rod). The only issue that I have with it is the tightening mechanism to attach the bait casting reel to the rod is plastic and it loosened up on me a couple times in the one trip that I have used it. I'm scared to over-tighten this part because the threads are plastic as well. I'll continue to monitor this issue to see what I will do in the future with this rod and reel combo.
customer_reviews.author: Mario Ramos

customer_reviews.title: Just buy them.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely amazing rod. Shocking that a rod this nice can be had for so cheap. Order four rods all together and absolutely love all 4. Hook keepers are in a great place and don’t get in the way and super sensitive. Will probably be replacing all the rods on my boat with these over time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Top of the line product !
customer_reviews.text: Saw a video online putting the Piscifun Torrent rod to the test, and I gotta say, no doubt it got my attention, especially for the price. I'm so glad I got me one for myself, VERY nice rod and for the price, can't be beat. Thanks Piscifun for an awesome product !
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really nice baitcasting rod!
customer_reviews.text: I have not used this rod yet as it is winter. I read the specs that look great, I can hardly wait to take this bad boy to the lake.
customer_reviews.author: Buyer # 1Top Contributor: Watches

customer_reviews.title: Great rod!
customer_reviews.text: Can not get over how great this rod has been, especially for the price! At first I was skeptical about it but after using it I’m blown away, great action, for a two piece the connection is amazing, will definitely purchase more!
customer_reviews.author: Todd

customer_reviews.title: It's an excellent rod no doubt!
customer_reviews.text: Paired it with the phantom reel & you can cast for weeks without getting tired. It's light as a feather yet powerful like a tank.
customer_reviews.author: Jack A.

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I expected
customer_reviews.text: Rod came with case and is the perfect weight. I ordered the medium heavy and it works great. I still have yet to fully use it seeing how we just made a move across states but once I'm able to use it more, I'll update this review. Overall, the look and feel of the rod is great.
customer_reviews.author: Devan F

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight but could be better
customer_reviews.text: Rod is sturdy and lightweight. The guides seem to "Scrape" braided line - especially the top guide. Could be better quality or a different material. Rod was delivered on Sept 1, 18. I used it once and line was scraped too bad to use again. On Dec 5, I found "fugi eyelet" was broken on the bottom side and I replaced the whole rod tip on this date. They should send me a new one for all the trouble I have had.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: The tip of rod snapped off.
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased the rod about 2 months ago and work out great until 2 inches of the tip snapped off yesterday. The rod was go to rod for my frogs. it casts lures country mile, light weight, and great action. I was thinking about replacing my other rods with, but not anymore. Maybe the rod I received was defective, so my review should not deter a reviewers from future purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Gail

customer_reviews.title: It’s more a MH/Mod fast action but stout!
customer_reviews.text: It’s a new rod, looks well built..not junk. Fished good but realized quick it has a parabolic bend to it when loaded, so it was dedicated to spinnerbaits and bladed jigs. My dislike is that I open to inspect and see the last 4 guides are crooked but don’t know how well the pics show it? I own lots of Piscifun products and plan on fishing this as long as it holds up due to great products from them so far!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Casts terrible
customer_reviews.text: The only rod in my collection that I actively dislike and regret buying. There's nothing "wrong" with the product feature-wise, it came as described and all, but casting is just terrible. I tried it with 3 different reels just to make sure, including Piscifun's own Torrent baitcaster, this rod just plainly sucks. At that price level, go for Ugly Stik GX2 instead, it's world's better.
customer_reviews.author: Racecar Fabricator

customer_reviews.title: Think I got a dud. Worth trying though.
customer_reviews.text: Rod seemed to be very nice. The tip broke while putting line on the rod. So I sent for a replacement. When the replacement came in and I checked the rod out but it was way more flexible than the first rod. It seemed better but for a rod of the same weight to be different from the exact same replacement shows me that that quality is not worth the price. Maybe mine was just a dud. They do make a really good reel. I will be installing the reel on another rod.
customer_reviews.author: tiff123

customer_reviews.title: Best rod for any price
customer_reviews.text: Best rod I own hands down. I normally end up using cheap Walmart fishing rods for most of my trips, but recently I decided to invest a little but more money into my hobby. The difference in quality, sensitivity and weight are mind blowing. This rod actually is the action and power listed, which is amazing (most rods this cheap tend to be at least one power below what they say they are, or lie about the action). Just buy one, you won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: William Gerhard

customer_reviews.title: Great rod for the money
customer_reviews.text: I'd put this up there against some of my most expensive St Croix rods. The action is great and it is super lightweight. I went with the torrent reel as well and it is an outstanding combo. This setup launches baits, I throw mostly bladed swim jigs, soft bodied swimbaits and spinnerbaits with this combo. I put 40# powerpro on the reel and it's just a joy to fish with. Rod was packaged very well for shipment and arrived on time with no issues whatsoever.
customer_reviews.author: Michael D.

customer_reviews.title: Likes and Dislikes
customer_reviews.text: I have two 1pc-7' Medium Heavy rods and I'm fishing 3 to 10 times a mouth. I enjoy using this rod and I enjoy catch bass. I do not enjoy my rod and or reel failing. When the eye came apart on one of my rods. I went back to amazon to check how long I have had these rods. Oct. 2018 / it's Sep. 2019. I have made two attempts to see what you might do for my rod. What Do You Say. Is your warranty words on paper or are you going to stand behind your warranty?
customer_reviews.author: Red J.

customer_reviews.title: Nice rod
customer_reviews.text: Looks very well built haven’t had a chance to use yet. Did watch a video on YouTube where they tried to break one and couldn’t. Very nicely priced for the quality
customer_reviews.author: Larry V

customer_reviews.title: Top notch customer service
customer_reviews.text: This is a quality rod for the price you pay. The guides are perfect. I really like the exposed rod blank under the reel seat a lot and I think it greatly enhances the feel. Although this rod is IM6, it feels as light as some of my 30 ton graphite rods and has plenty of sensitivity. I initially had a small problem with my order, but Piscifun customer service went above and beyond to make it right. Thanks, this was a pleasant surprise in today's "customer service" environment where most companies could care less about you. I am going to purchase from this company again!
customer_reviews.author: Michael  R.

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: I was in the market for a MH rod and after doing my research I settled on Piscifun Torrent. Very happy with this rod....it's well made and very responsive. I've only used it twice but I can already tell it will be my go-to rod this summer. Very important....unlike other rods I've ordered online the packaging of this rod before being shipped was exceptional. It was in a hard cylindrical tube with packing material on the inside.
customer_reviews.author: NewHopeBuyer

customer_reviews.title: Can't go wrong with that price.
customer_reviews.text: Incredibly lightweight. The EVA grips are very comfortable. MH fast action, 7'1". Pairs great with the PhantomX 7.4. Takes some getting used to a longer rod. I hit the ceiling with it all the time but it's held up great. Durability will tell over time, it's only been a month. Shippied in an extremely thick cardboard tube. Big brown & Purple&orange would have to try hard to damage it.
customer_reviews.author: jeff

customer_reviews.title: Anxious to try it out
customer_reviews.text: While I haven't had an opportunity to use this particular rod, the other I purchased from you is as described and I'm very happy with it. The reels are also very good quality. I'm just starting fishing again after a 35 year hiatus. I didn't realize the the change that came over the fishing scene. I was from the old spinning reel attached to whatever pole you could afford on a kids .25 cent allowance class and now find myself in a high tech industry with matching reels to rods and rods to various fish. I have been very happy with your products and have adopted you as my go-to site for fishing gear.
customer_reviews.author: RaQue

customer_reviews.title: Nice rod.
customer_reviews.text: Ove all it’s a good rod,I like the black and red color,looks very nice,I’m not real sure about durability on this one,I can hear the cracking sound out of the reel seat when casting,sounds like it’s gonna break,I might just got a defected one,not sure how well it’ll hold up. I’m not recommending on buying at this time. I also have a 6’10 medium heavy (does not have any problems)which I love it so much,it’s very light and very well balance.
customer_reviews.author: Ricky.s

customer_reviews.title: My first Piscifun, NOT DISAPPOINTED!
customer_reviews.text: The Rod came in a nice cloth travel case. It is a beautiful well built rod and I am anxious to put it through the ringers and I’ll do just that tomorrow. This rod and a Piscifun Alijos baitcasting reel are going on a bluecat trip tomorrow and the test will begin. Results to come later.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffery Baker

customer_reviews.title: Feel and balance and eyes on the rod
customer_reviews.text: Well the rods looked great but I haven't had time or weather to use them yet,i do like the feel of them and they looks great,love the eyes on these rods.I am sure they will be just fine.Can't wait to use them and love the way they was packaged.
customer_reviews.author: Coleman Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Snapped pole... First bigger fish
customer_reviews.text: The pole has nice action and worked well for light to medium lures. However, the first time I caught anything bigger than a bluegill, the pole snapped. Bummer. Don't believe the photo in the listing showing the heavy item handing from the bent pole. Nope.
customer_reviews.author: P. Eddy

customer_reviews.title: Best rod I have purchased in a while
customer_reviews.text: I have several of these rods and they are amazing. I have a rod box full of rods and I have found myself reaching for these over my others. They are light, very comfortable to throw all day, very sensitive and have one heck of a back bone to them. I am hooked on these and for the price of them they are definitely affordable.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Just an all around good  rod and budget friendly won't break your budget
customer_reviews.text: Trout red fish and flounder fishing a very well balance rod would highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good rod for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Works good for the price. Not the best gear out there but does the job well. I also got the Torrent reel that goes with this rod. Good combination. I keep using this setup instead of my other gear for the last few weeks and that says alot.
customer_reviews.author: S. RiveraTop Contributor: Bass Guitars & Gear

customer_reviews.title: Piscifun rod/reel
customer_reviews.text: The torrent exceeded my expectations. Delivery was prompt. Packaging was excellent. I immediately applied my piscifun phantom reel and headed to the lake. Both were a purchase well worth the money. High quality product at an affordable price. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: william smart

customer_reviews.title: Great company with awesome customer service.
customer_reviews.text: Great rod, definitely met my expectations. The only reason why I gave 4 stars is because one of the inserts on one of the guides had broke and fell off, nothing serious but it still works great and I’d definitely recommend it to a friend and will be buying more in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Hysmith

customer_reviews.title: Price was low while product was of high quality
customer_reviews.text: I just had the first chance to use this rod today with my son and after we had both used it extensively he decided to get his own and I’m purchasing 2 more of these rods. Very sensitive nice action very comfortable to use all day. Thanks for a fine product!
customer_reviews.author: Cheyanne

customer_reviews.title: Bought a Second One...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this rod a little over a year ago, and fished quite a bit with it. A month ago, I ended up stepping on it and broke it. I really liked the rod, so I bought another. The rod is very light and sensitive for the price point. I bought the 6'-10" MH Fast taper, and I can use it for a few different applications. Definitely would recommend this rod as a budget model.
customer_reviews.author: David B.

customer_reviews.title: Rod tip is too fragile
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the Torrent 7'0 one piece rod for my spinner bait rod on June 25, 2019, from that time to now, September 26, 2019 (3 months) I may have used this rod twice with this pass week being the 3rd time. I made a cast with my spinner bait a reeled in some grass. As I proceeded to to remove the grass from my spinner bait, the tip snapped with very little pressure. I know this rod advertises that the rod tip is flexible but it shouldn't break that easily. I shutter to think what would happen if a nice fish was on the other end.
customer_reviews.author: BRIAN BEASLEY

customer_reviews.title: Quality rod & a entry level price
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best rods I've bought. It is balanced really well. For the money you can't go wrong. I paired in up with one of Piscifun phantom reels. And put their braided line on the reel. This company is a one stop shop. One place you can buy a custom parts to build a setup you want & not pay for the name. Piscifun is going to be the next great thing in bass fishing
customer_reviews.author: MIchael D Melton

customer_reviews.title: Nice rod good value
customer_reviews.text: Might be a bit long for my 9 yr old grandson but he will quickly grow into it if his dad doesn’t keep it for himself 😉
customer_reviews.author: caycoffee

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Its very light and durable. A perfect combo with my piscifun torrent reel. Thought I was ordering the 7ft but this serves my purpose
customer_reviews.author: earl royster

customer_reviews.title: New to bait casting
customer_reviews.text: First bait casting rod it looks well made and I also purchased the Piscifun Torrent reel to go with it looking forward to getting out to the lake I will update this review after i use both the reel and rod
customer_reviews.author: Keith W. Cahalan

customer_reviews.title: Great quality.
customer_reviews.text: Haven’t actually used on the water yet. Rod was packaged very nicely for shipping and placed in a tube for more security. Rod is a little on the heavier side but that’s what you get with a 7”6 heavy frog rod.
customer_reviews.author: Edward Waters

customer_reviews.title: Great price
customer_reviews.text: Great sturdy rod, great price and ive gotten my fair share fish with it!
customer_reviews.author: Jose A Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: INDESTRUCTIBLE?? I'm very happy with this incredible rod
customer_reviews.text: Check out the Youtuber that tries to snap one of these Torrents. Amazing. I have 2 of these (M and MH) I love them. I paired both with a Torrent baitcasters. Couldn't be happier.
customer_reviews.author: DavidR

customer_reviews.title: Have fun and try it
customer_reviews.text: So I'm new to the baitcasting world and wanted to make a small investment. So far it's been fun, I use this combo out of my kayak catching reds and trout. I'm very happy with my purchase and it's performance. The learning curve from spinning to this bait casting set up was comical, getting better thou. SPI
customer_reviews.author: Christy Neely

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: It was not as limber as I suspected. I use it for crappie. It is sentive to the bite. Over all a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect match for my Piscifun reel.
customer_reviews.text: Really nice rod perfect when paired with my Piscifun Phantom X baitcast reel for Bass or Trout This is my second Torrent Rod for a Piscifun reel. Caught my limit of trout yesterday.
customer_reviews.author: armedinaz

customer_reviews.title: Good Rod
customer_reviews.text: This rod is a bit heavier than I prefer. I most likely would not buy another one, but it has been a great rod at this point. I think it is a pretty darn good value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Shane Weigand

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: Rod has a nice feel, good quality. Came in hard tube & well packed.I got the 6'6 so not as much whipping action as with longer rods, but great control for tight spots
customer_reviews.author: Al E

customer_reviews.title: Fish Whisperer
customer_reviews.text: Great fishing rod! Telegraphs what the fish are doing at the end of the line. I catch more fish because of it! Love to get this rod in an ultralight version.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Can't go wrong with Piscifun products!
customer_reviews.text: Nice rod, well made and great price point. Have it paired with the torrent baitcaster, look great together and already have caught a few bass!
customer_reviews.author: Mark Gordon

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: Love it super slick very well made Tuff guides put the BB2 on w/ 30lb braid 1/2oz wt.Cast into low hanging oak limb on purpose couldn't break or bend anything Ha. Feels great I fish salt & fresh believe I'll be very happy !
customer_reviews.author: A W

customer_reviews.title: Great rods for the price. Awsome !!
customer_reviews.text: Really nice rods. Very light. I really like this rod I will deffinatly get more. Way better then my Lews speedsticks
customer_reviews.author: James M. H.

customer_reviews.title: Well-balanced rod
customer_reviews.text: I’m not crazy about the split handle. I know, (everybody makes them that way) I just would prefer a full handle. Love the feel of the rod. Well-balanced, super light and matches well with my torrent reel. I’ve been touting Piscifun gear since I discovered it. Great gear, great value and better than one might guess from the pricing.
customer_reviews.author: J. Gordian

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Very nice rod. Super lightweight. Paired it with the Piscifun Torrent reel. Makes for a great combination. I have the medium but acts more like medium heavy. Quickly becoming my favorite rod and reel combination.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Zimmer

customer_reviews.title: Good rod
customer_reviews.text: I haven't got to use it much but seems to be a decent rod
customer_reviews.author: Ross P. Kline

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Matched with Calcutta 200gt reel. Casts far. Stiff enough to drag through weeds. Sensitive enough to feel those light halibut bites. Sturdy enough to drag in a 4'6" shark with no worries.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Very Impressed
customer_reviews.text: Wow I’m very impressed with this rod. I have rods that are $100 more and this rod is just as good . Nice wraps and guides and nice feeling reelseat .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly surprised
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for a new jig rod and stumbled upon this. I saw the great reviews, and watched a video on YouTube and they all talked about the sensitivity. I'm very happy with the sens on this rod! I feel like I can feel more on this rod with flouro on it, than the old rod I was using with braid.
customer_reviews.author: L. Ward

customer_reviews.title: Great value for a good rod
customer_reviews.text: This rod is light and is stiff.. It can handle any fresh water fish. stiff and fast tip with a lot of backbone in the MH 7'1".
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Great jig rod, took it for a test in puerto rico for fresh water lake fishing. Landed pretty decent size fish, rod held well.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Recommended.
customer_reviews.text: This rod has been great so far. It is lightweight and easy to handle. The price was right and performance has been incredible. I will purchase more as my needs grow.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: A great rod for the price !
customer_reviews.text: It goes great with a super lite reel, but could be priced much more and can compare with a rod priced $50.00 more.
customer_reviews.author: Brett

customer_reviews.title: Top shelf rod....basement price!!!
customer_reviews.text: Nice fast tip but plenty of backbone...$200 + rod feel and weight....if your on the fence, get off and try this company you wont be disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Travis

customer_reviews.title: Great Rod
customer_reviews.text: I put this rod with a Piscifun 7.1 reel to use for pitching in thernament bass fishing in central FL. The rod is heavy duty to get the bass out quickl;y, so far it does the job.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love Piscifun
customer_reviews.text: I have no complaints with Piscifun products. Solid, functional and affordable.
customer_reviews.author: Tanya Ahina

customer_reviews.title: Yikes.
customer_reviews.text: The tip and a little more broke off reeling a small 1.5 pounder. What a shame.
customer_reviews.author: A. Rohrer

customer_reviews.title: Great rod
customer_reviews.text: I’ve never used anything by Piscifun but this rod is well worth the money. 👍🏻👍🏻
customer_reviews.author: Doc3179

customer_reviews.title: Thank you 😊
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t tried it out yet but I love the way it looks thank you.
customer_reviews.author: gilbertalves

customer_reviews.title: well made
customer_reviews.text: Great feel, improved my cast using same reel from a previous Rod.
customer_reviews.author: Will West

customer_reviews.title: Holds up to the needs.
customer_reviews.text: Holds up very well. sensitive, and will hold up to some big fish.
customer_reviews.author: txump

customer_reviews.title: Casting pole.
customer_reviews.text: Fir now, I'll give it 5 stars. I've been working on my casting. We'll see how it performs in 5days.
customer_reviews.author: mark G.

customer_reviews.title: Love this rod.
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful rods! Only reason why I gave FOUR STARS is that I won't be able to use them because it is WINTER where I live! Come May, I will hit the lakes. PS...I plan on buying THREE Piscifun reels soon.
customer_reviews.author: dlg

customer_reviews.title: Ok for the money but not great
customer_reviews.text: Rod is stiffer and does not feel sensitive to line vibrations
customer_reviews.author: Tim F

customer_reviews.title: Great Rod!
customer_reviews.text: I love this rod! My first Piscifun, but it won't be my last.
customer_reviews.author: L Hatfield

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, stylish and great price
customer_reviews.text: Haven't caught anything on it but when I do...it's gonna be sweet.
customer_reviews.author: Chet 523

customer_reviews.title: Swim baits rod
customer_reviews.text: It's a great rod for swim baits, for 3-6 inch swim baits.
customer_reviews.author: D. Legend

customer_reviews.title: Great buy and quality!
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with the quality on this good deal! This rating rod doesn't have too much backbone but I wanted a light setup like this to throw 6-10# test on and this rod will give me good action on even smaller fish but looks and bends with quality and strength. I'll be able to hop from Bass to Trout to Carp on this puppy! 👍😁
customer_reviews.author: Julio L.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for the money.
customer_reviews.text: I just got this rod and only fished it twice. Very satisfied. It even cast light lures well.
customer_reviews.author: crafter

customer_reviews.title: Super Sensitive!
customer_reviews.text: Very impressed with this rod. Super sensitive and lightweight. I've used another brand for several years, I'm totally switching over to Piscifun rods. You couldn't ask for better quality and customer service in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Mark C

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.text: We are using this rod with a piscifun bait cast reel. It is amazing and I recommend it to anyone that is shopping for a rod! We are going to order a couple of the 6’8” rods for fishing docks and tight cover. Amazing product!
customer_reviews.author: Kevin O.

customer_reviews.title: Great rod!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve only had this rod a couple of weeks but have caught a few decent large fish. Love the action.
customer_reviews.author: LEWIS TURPIN

customer_reviews.title: Awesome grip
customer_reviews.text: Super nice rod. This rod has and awesome grip when casting. Especially if your a one hand caster.
customer_reviews.author: N Alferez

customer_reviews.title: As described
customer_reviews.text: Great product arrived ahead of time happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I put a matching reel and now it's my go to set up
customer_reviews.author: wm St.pete

customer_reviews.title: The tip of the rod broke
customer_reviews.text: As soon as I casted for the first time the tip of the rod broke off. Disappointed as I found that this rod was the best for the price it was sold to have it instantly break.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Ratinaud

customer_reviews.title: Nice price
customer_reviews.text: Awsome two pieces casting pole, mine came with missing line guide insert ring.
customer_reviews.author: Blong Lee

customer_reviews.title: Broken after a few months
customer_reviews.text: Would not purchase this rod. Broke in half on me just a few months in use. Not even bent a lot when it broke.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: New Rod
customer_reviews.text: Attached a Piscifun Torrent to this to use it for top water fishing.Nice rod,I like it.
customer_reviews.author: Randy Acovangelo

customer_reviews.title: Haven't used yet, proper review after trip.
customer_reviews.text: I can't give an accurate review of the product for approximately 1.5 months. It was purchased for a fishing trip in September. It looks beautiful, even after the rough trip it took. I'll give an updated review after my trip.
customer_reviews.author: Tuck

customer_reviews.title: Very flexible
customer_reviews.text: I'm very happy with rod its definitely what it is listed as and more
customer_reviews.author: blane65

customer_reviews.title: Can’t go wrong with these rods
customer_reviews.text: Light, very sensitive, good backbone a bit stiff on the tip for moderate action but all in all a good rod.
customer_reviews.author: Paul LaMarche

customer_reviews.title: Great rod, good price
customer_reviews.text: This a lightweight, sensitive, and strong rod. I have a heavy fast action rod for frogging
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

product_meta.title: Piscifun Torrent Baitcasting Rod - Durable Lightweight Sensitive Tournament Quality Casting Fishing Rod One Piece & Two Pieces Baitcast Rods
feature_bullets: Versatile - If you're just starting out and want a good all around type rod, Medium Heavy and Medium baitcasting rod is the best choice
More Durable - Two piece baitcasting rod design is crafted with a composite of graphite and fiberglass, creating a well-balanced yet powerful rod that is virtually unbreakable
Sensitive - Tip design for extra strength and added sensitivity allows you to detect even the faintest nibbles, you can perfectly time your hook set and improve your catch rates

Lightweight - The lightweight casting fishing rod design feels balanced in your hand, helps improve your range of movement and keeping fatigue to a minimum. EVA grip offers the firm, comfortable handhold you need to overcome hard-fighting fish
High-quality Guide - Stainless steel guides with Zirconium inserts that eliminate insert pop-outs and keep line slippage to a minimum, can be used with all types of line, including braid fishing line

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
